body.p: Expenditure on an intangible item shall be recognised as an expense when it is incurred unless:

li.p: it forms part of the cost of an intangible asset that meets the recognition criteria (see paragraphs 18–67); or

the item is acquired in a business combination and cannot be recognised as an intangible asset. If this is the case, it forms part of the amount recognised as goodwill at the acquisition date (see IFRS 3).
